ActJudges Act
SubjectSheila A. Carrothers ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. A. Brian B. Carrothers **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to SHEILA A. CARROTHERS, survivor of the Hon. A. Brian B. Carrothers, a Judge of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, effective December 5, 2014.
